chatPreview.text: Hi, I need a new toilet installed. What do you charge?
Hey! Thanks for reaching out. Toilet installs typically run $150-250 depending on the setup. Do you already have the toilet, or need help picking one?
I have it already. It's a standard floor mount.
Perfect ‚Äî standard installs are straightforward. I can get Gagan out to you as soon as tomorrow. What's your zip code? I'll check availability.
Great, that's right in our area! I have a morning slot open tomorrow. Can I grab your name and number so Gagan can confirm?

chatPreview.text: I need a garage cleaned out ASAP. How much?
Hey! Garage cleanouts typically run $200-500 depending on how full it is. Single car or double?
No problem ‚Äî Matt handles those all the time. We can usually get there within 24-48 hours. Want me to set up a quick estimate? Just need your address and a photo if you have one.
Yeah that works. It's in Lockport.
Perfect, Lockport is right in our zone. Let me grab your name and number and Matt will call you back within the hour to schedule. üëç
